level.heading: Conflicts of regulations.
level.text: Unless a federal law or regulation or District of Columbia statute requires that a particular federal or District of Columbia procedure be observed, this chapter and the rules promulgated pursuant to this chapter shall take precedence in the event of a conflict with other authority with regard to any issue involving or relating to procedures of the Office.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 14-76
level.text: For Law 14-76, see notes following ยง 2-1831.01.
